review: My Amazon Fire Stick showed up on time. The setup was super easy. I spent the next three hours going through the LONG list of apps. that are downloadable . You can shop directly on your TV or log into your amazon on your account from your computer/tablet and shop for the apps that way. I bought the three months of Sling TV to get the Fire Stick free. I will not pay the high amounts for cable or Dish because we only watch 2 or 3 of the channels. Sling is perfect for our family. I kept Hulu and Netflix so all together we have a great selection of shows/movies for way less then you would pay a month for cable or dish.
